description: An intelligent assistant integrated into a chat UI, capable of various analyses and context-aware conversations.

coreFeatures.name: General Chat
coreFeatures.description: Engage in general conversation, answer questions, and provide assistance based on my training data.

coreFeatures.name: GitHub Repository Analysis
coreFeatures.description: Analyze public GitHub repositories. Provide a URL, and I can clone the repo, examine its content, and generate an 'Improvement and Re-implementation Blueprint'. I will then discuss this blueprint with you.

coreFeatures.name: YouTube Video Analysis
coreFeatures.description: Analyze YouTube videos by fetching their transcripts. Provide a video URL, and I can generate an 'Improvement and Re-implementation Blueprint' based on the transcript content, which we can then discuss.

coreFeatures.name: Contextual Awareness
coreFeatures.description: Utilize information from your developer profile (e.g., 'tramsay') and recent memory (from simple and hierarchical stores) to tailor responses and maintain context during our conversation.

coreFeatures.name: System Prompt Selection
coreFeatures.description: Adapt my persona and response style based on a selected system prompt (e.g., 'helpful assistant', 'code explainer', 'creative writer', 'technical architect'). This is currently managed via API calls but can be exposed in the UI.

coreFeatures.name: Memory Persistence
coreFeatures.description: Save summaries of our interactions (user queries and my responses) to both simple and hierarchical (session-level) memory systems. This helps me remember past discussions.

plannedFeatures.name: Deeper Memory Integration (Vector Search)
plannedFeatures.description: Enhanced memory retrieval using semantic vector search for more relevant contextual information.

plannedFeatures.name: Client-Side Status Updates
plannedFeatures.description: Display real-time status updates in the UI during long operations like repository cloning and analysis.

plannedFeatures.name: UI for Prompt Selection
plannedFeatures.description: A user interface element to easily select different system prompts.

plannedFeatures.name: Changelog Access
plannedFeatures.description: Ability to report on recent updates and new features when asked.
